New Season Passes will be available for purchase starting September 5th at the Polo office.
Hours:
                Mon-Thu 10am-3pm
Polo Office
703 N. Buena Vista Blvd.
352-750-7656
Enjoy your time off the field!
Accommodation Options
The Brownwood Hotel & Spa
3003 Brownwood Boulevard, The Villages, FL, 32163
Phone: 352-626-1246
Located in the heart of Florida’s friendliest hometown as the only premier AAA 4-diamond location,
The Brownwood Hotel & Spa
invites you to celebrate the past and the
            present.
We embrace the history of the Floridian cowboy, offering guests a glimpse into the state’s true heritage.
With 151 thoughtfully-appointed rooms, a medi-spa, and endless attractions, guests of all generations will
            follow their adventurous spirit and cherish our unparalleled hospitality.
The Waterfront Inn
located in Lake Sumter Landing Market Square®
1105 Lakeshore Drive, The Villages, FL, 32159
Phone: 352-753-7535
Lake Sumter Landing™ is a great place to take in as much of the shopping and dining and fun that you’ll find
            throughout our hometown – all in one place!
You’ll find FREE entertainment every night on the square surrounded by local and nationally known boutiques,
            restaurants, and a movie theater all in a quaint, waterfront setting.
For shorter stays,
The Waterfront Inn
is located at Lake Sumter Landing™ and can be
            contracted at 800-528-3132. For longer stays, monthly house rentals may also be arranged.
For questions on any of your lodging needs, please call us at 352-750-7656 or
email us
for information.
Hampton Inn & Suites
11727 NE 63rd Dr, Lady Lake, FL 32162
Phone: 352-259-8246
Website
Just a few short minutes from The Villages Polo Club, Hampton Inn is available for hotel stay!
We’re a couple of miles from Highway 301. Its three miles to Lake Sumter Landing’s shops, restaurants, park, and children’s playground. The historic Spanish Springs Town Square is four miles away, and you’ll find several golf courses within a few minutes too. Relax in our outdoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.
Use Corporate Code 3374940 to obtain our Polo rate!
Marriott Town Place
1141 Alonzo Ave
The Villages, FL 32159
352-753-8686
Website

1202 Avenida Central
The Villages, FL 32159
352-259-6578
Website

Holiday Inn Express
1205 Avenida Central North
The Villages, FL 32159
352-750-3888
Website
Pet Friendly

ABOUT US Our Club For over 20 years The Villages Polo Club has provided an unforgettable polo experience for thousands of spectators and hundreds of polo players from around the world. Located in the heart of Florida’s Friendliest Hometown®, one hour north of Orlando and thirty minutes south of Ocala. Our 250 acre polo facility offers you a chance to experience the amazing world of polo. The Villages Polo Club offers first-class facilities and the largest crowds in the U.S., with over 30,000 spectators each year. Our competitive, 6-12 goal polo spans over two full seasons: the spring, running March through May, and fall, running late September through November. The Villages Polo Club’s two level stadium resides on an elevated berm, giving you breathtaking views from any seat. Bottom Carousel Indicators Carousel Slides / Quotes Rhonda Oldman “The announcer upstairs explains the games as you go along. So that helps a lot but It’s just great. Everyone is going to have such a good time. How could you not have a good time. Just one of the advantages from living here in the Villages.” Biff Gratton “It’s just a phenomenal sport. It’s so exciting. So fast paced. Incredible players. It’s amazing. There’s nothing like it in the world. It’s an incredible place to be. Where else can you find a place with this gorgeous exciting sport, amazing people and amazing attendance?” Christine Press “It’s fun. It’s just a fun time. It’s exciting. You don’t realize how fast the horses are running. I mean, you can stomp the divots, like, you know, pretty woman… we just have a fun time with our friends. So it’s great!” Daniel Miller-Grossman “This is my first time at a polo game, but I am loving it. I’m having a really good time. I’m here with my aunt, and it’s just been awesome to learn about polo and, see the horses in action. It’s been a really good time.” The Experience Join us for an exciting, action-packed afternoon of polo and experience a professional sport unlike any other! From the skill and athleticism of the players, to the power and agility of the thundering hooves they ride, to the enthusiasm of the crowd around you, you're sure to fall in love watching this legendary sport. TAILGATING Bring your own chairs, tent, food and drinks and enjoy the match under the Florida sunshine. ALL SEATING
THEMED DAYS

Every Sunday fans enjoy dressing in a unique theme which you can find listed with the match information on the schedule. SCHEDULE

CONCESSIONS You'll find a concession stand and full bar located under the pavilion so you can grab a bite or a cocktail while you enjoy the match. MENU LIVE MUSIC Come on out and enjoy live music in our pavilion from 4:30 – 6:00 on select Fridays along with a cash bar and food options. Check out the schedule for more information SCHEDULE CHAMPAGNE DIVOT STOMP A polo ritual you might remember from Pretty Woman, join us on the field between chukkers for our Champagne Divot Stomp! Sponsored by KNOW THE GAME GIFTS & APPAREL Find The Final Chukker Shoppe under the pavilion to get all The Villages Polo Club gear you need to be a super fan! LEARN MORE FURRY FRIENDS If you're tailgating at a match, feel free to bring your leashed pet to enjoy the day with you! Service animals are permitted in the stadium area as well. SEATING OPTIONS MEET & GREETS Have the opportunity to meet some of the players and ponies after the game and take your picture or get an autograph. The Final Chukker Find all of your polo-related essentials from jackets to decorations. You’ll find a wide-variety of polo personalized items, along with wonderful and knowledgeable staff ready to help you find that perfect polo piece. The Final Chukker is a must-see part of The Villages Polo Club, open during polo matches on Friday and Sunday. Offering: Apparel Hats Glassware Accessories Hours:
DayTime
Friday2:00pm - 5:00pm
Sunday12:00pm - 4:00pm
Opens Friday & Sunday when gates open and closes when match ends. The Final Chukker is only open during the Spring and Fall Polo seasons.
